name: Own The Floor
description:
A 2.5D dancing bullet-hell game, where you have to keep the flow of the party night show going! 😎 NOTE: For the best experience, please download the standalone version of the game. The web build may not work  on itch.io due to the compression format (Brotli) that was used to build the game for WebGL. ControlsKey bindingsMovementWASD / Arrow keysExit to main menu / PauseEscape key Main Features:
  • Perform in 5+ unique stages across different periods and dimensions.
  • Take back on evil interdimensional rascals and monsters who came to ruin your concerts!
  • Unlock special abilities to sharpen your dancing skills!
  • Vibe to eccentric music tracks! The game features its own original soundtrack (soon to be published)
  • Challenge your friends! After playing a level, your score gets submitted to an online competitive leaderboard of that level!
Credits:
  • Dan - Director, Lead Programmer
  • deadgenghis - 2D tileset artist, Programmer, Sound Designer, Musician
  • LemonCasino - 2D audience artist
  • Omtdh - Main 2D artist, manager
  • Rohan - UI artist, Programmer
  • Wolfenrahd - 2D artist, Musician
  • Rendered - 3D artist, Programmer
  • CWeed420 - Musician
  • GeniusApple - 2D enemy artist
  • RykuzuStudios - Character and Cover artist
